titles.title: San Gabriel Mountains Forever Act of 2017
San Gabriel Mountains Forever Act of 2017

To designate certain Federal lands in the State of California as wilderness areas and as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System, to designate portions of the San Gabriel River and Little Rock Creek in that State as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
San Gabriel Mountains Forever Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
